text: okay so I was a struggling actress in
New York and um I had a couple agents
working with me but uh no one that uh
was getting me really auditions for big
parts and um so I was always I was
always kind of looking around for my own
way way of getting out there and I had a
Drama teacher or I had an acting coach
once tell me make your own vehicle
you're not you're not GNA get out there
just by going to auditions and working
for someone else try to be a producer or
um somehow get out there on your own and
do your own thing and make your own
project so uh I was always looking for a
way to do that and I came across
actually an advertisement on Craigslist
for rocket Boom for someone that was a
writer slash um actress or host and I
thought hm this is very interesting and
this was in 2004 and uh I remember
telling my mom about it and she was like
the internet video on the internet um is
that porn and I was like no no Mom are
you kidding me no obviously not not that
she thought that I would do porn but on
the internet that was kind of what
people thought about video on the
internet there was no video on the
internet other than that so um yeah it
was it was kind of a completely new idea
to to me A New Concept
entirely um and I I applied for the job
didn't hear back forever thought you
know I had been applying for so many
different jobs I had no idea um you know
really what I was doing and uh I ended
up going in for an interview uh I had to
write my own script for my first episode
and or for my P the pilot episode of
rocket Boom and I ended up getting the
job and from there uh ended up working
at
ABC and really though uh wanted to or
actually after rocket Boom did aand
Across America which led me to ABC I
actually traveled across America to go
to La for ABC and um while I was at ABC
ABC I thought you know I'm learning a
lot that I would never I never would
have known if I hadn't tried old media
um but I took what was from New Media I
took and I took some things from old
media and I started my own business and
that was really the goal uh my
grandfather once told me that you'll
never make any money unless you start
your own business you'll never make any
money working for somebody else so I
thought well that's got to be the end
game and uh that's kind of how I ended
up with sometimes
daily well I think in terms of how I got
to uh got to in terms of how I started
using video it was more of a way uh I've
always been more interested in in film
than say theater and so as a performer
it was kind of a natural way of uh
merging into this New Media uh medium
but I think I think the real reason that
people decide to do video is because
they want to connect eye to eye in a way
with whoever it is uh is on the other
end I know that when I'm looking into
the camera um it's almost like a magic a
magic feeling because I can I can feel
um the pulsating eyes on the other end
kind of listening already there's
something about a camera uh that is
almost immediate even if it's not live
and that's exciting and compelling to me
and then of course um as they say you
know a picture is uh you know is a
thousand words or whatever uh a video a
moving image how many pictures are are
in every um you know minute of footage
and uh you can you can show so much more
with b-roll and voiceover it paints such
a such a different picture than say uh
an article or a Blog not to say those
aren't excellent and valid mediums but
they're not just not for
me I don't mind that I'm all over the
Internet and that my personal life is
out there and that my professional life
is out there uh I actually when I go on
a vacation I feel so compelled to then
put pictures up it's like I can't not
document everywhere I go because then
where is it it's it doesn't live anymore
I mean it's in my memory but I need it
to remember I need to document things so
that I can remember them and then I
think how can I go to this beautiful
place and not share it I just I I um I
always think when I go off on a vacation
or something that I'll just sit back and
not not um worry about uh documenting
things but then I always end up doing it
anyway so uh it's almost as if it's
second nature and I don't know if that's
because uh I grew up kind of with the
internet and um I probably am the first
generation that uh grew up starting you
know in middle school with the internet
uh so I think that it's something that
just is ingrained in who I am um rather
than you know something that I have to
do out of necessity
